title: Online Family Life Education Program: Simulation/VR-Based Leadership Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in family relationship management and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: A Simulation/VR-Based Training Program for Managers/Leaders Aged 40+ to Develop Communication and Problem-Solving Skills in Real-Life Family Scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze family conflict scenarios in VR simulation environments and apply effective communication strategies with 80% accuracy
Learners can identify family members' emotional needs and establish customized support plans using online collaboration tools
Learners can demonstrate a 30% or greater improvement in family relationship management competencies after program participation through mid-formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
